resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/78108</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>78108</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40cf0ae9-a444-41ed-250f-4db43bc5dddc#1#3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Szent Dénes élete.</string>
            <string language="en">The life of Saint Denis.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Leben von Heiligem Denis.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La vie de Saint Denis.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A vida de Saint Denis.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La vita di San Denis.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η ζωή Αγίου Denis.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La vida de Santo Denis.</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Dagobert király abba a kápolnába menekül, ahová korábbban Szt Dénest temették.</string>
            <string language="en">King Dagobert flees to that chapel where Saint Denis is buried</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Saint-Denis-apátság,  Szent Dénes,  szentek legendái,  üvegfestmények,  miniatúra,  Dagobert király,  </string>
            <string language="en">Saint Denis Abbey, Saint Denis, legends of the saints, paintings on glass, miniature, King Dagobert</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">König Dagobert flieht zu dieser Kapelle, in der 
Heiliger Denis begraben wird</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Roi Dagobert se sauve à cette chapelle où Saint Denis
est enterré</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O rei Dagobert foge a esse chapel onde Saint Denis é 
enterrado</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il re Dagobert fuggisce a quel chapel in cui San Denis è 
sepolto</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο βασιλιάς Dagobert φεύγει σε εκείνο το παρεκκλησι 
όπου Αγιος Denis θάβεται</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Rey Dagobert huye a esa capilla en donde entierran a Santo
Denis</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Heiliger Denis Abtei, Heiliger Denis, Legenden der 
Heiligen, Anstriche auf Glas, Miniatur, König Dagobert</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Abbaye de Saint Denis, Saint Denis, légendes des saints,
peintures sur le verre, miniature, le Roi Dagobert</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Abadia de Saint Denis, Saint Denis, legendas dos saints,
pinturas no vidro, miniatura, rei Dagobert</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Abbey del San Denis, San Denis, leggende dei san, 
pitture su vetro, miniatura, re Dagobert</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αβαείο Αγίου Denis, Αγιος Denis, μύθοι των Αγίων, 
έργα ζωγραφικής στο γυαλί, μικρογραφία, βασιλιάς Dagobert</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Abadía de Santo Denis, Santo Denis, leyendas de los 
santos, pinturas sobre el cristal, miniatura, rey Dagobert</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn:
org:Veszprémi Egyetem
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>591</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>78108</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://sdt.sulinet.hu/Player/default.aspx?g=40cf0ae9-a444-41ed-250f-4db43bc5dddc&v=1&b=3</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
